data.title: Find the model name, serial number, or software version of your TV
data.text:
You can find the model name, serial number, and software version of your Android TV™ or Google TV™ in the following locations:

You can find the model name and the serial number by referring to the original packaging, product sticker, and TV system information.

To find the Software version, refer to TV system information.

On the original packaging

Notes: Included in the box is a User Manual where you can also find the model number.

On the product stickers

The model name is normally found on the sticker located at the back of the TV, located on a label near the side input terminals, or engraved on the front panel of the TV. Please be aware that the model and serial numbers are different:

Model name

Serial number

On the product sticker for a wall-mounted TV

If your TV is mounted on the wall you can find the model and serial number on the product sticker on the back of the TV using a small hand mirror and your mobile phone.

Find a small hand or inspection mirror that can fit behind the TV.

Locate the product sticker on the back of the TV. It is usually located in the right bottom corner or the bottom center on the back of the TV.

Hold the mirror behind the TV so that you can clearly see the label from the front or side of the TV.

You can use your mobile phone to take a picture of the label in the mirror.

Use the edit feature on your mobile phone to flip the image horizontally.

TV's system information

The method for checking information such as the model name varies depending on the software version for Sony's Android TV™ or Google TV™ models and the release year for TVs other than Android TV or Google TV. Choose your TV type and check the details:

Android TV and Google TV:

On the remote control, press the HELP button.

Notes: If your remote control does not have a HELP button, refer to the Note below step 2.

The following steps will depend on your TV menu options:

Select System information in the Status & Diagnostics or Troubleshooting and system information Category.

Select Contact & Support.

For W8L, X77L, W8K, X74K_X75K, W8, X7 series: The model name is displayed at the bottom left of the screen.

The screen varies depending on your TV model. The following are examples.

Notes: The following procedure is also available depending on the model.

Open the Settings screen.

If the remote control has a Quick Settings ( or ) button, press the Quick Settings button and select Settings.

If the remote control does not have a Quick Settings ( or ) button, press the HOME button and select Settings

The next steps will depend on your TV menu options:

Select Help and Feedback → Help → Status & Diagnostics → System information

Select Apps → Help → System information in the Status & Diagnostics or Troubleshooting and system information Category

Select Help → System information in the Troubleshooting and system information Category

Select BRAVIA Settings → Customer Support → Contact & Support

TVs other than Android TV or Google TV:

TVs released in 2015 and later:

On the remote control, press the HOME button.

Select Settings.

Select System Settings or Product Support.

Select Customer Support or System Information.

Select Product Information.

The screen varies depending on your TV model.

TVs released in 2014:

On the remote control, press the HOME button.

Select (?) Help.

Select Customer Support.

Select System Information.

The screen varies depending on your TV model.

TVs released in 2013 or before:

On the remote control, press the HOME button.

Select Settings.

Select Product Support or Set-up.

Select System Information or Product Information.

The screen varies depending on your TV model.
